title: experiencing fps drops since 6.16?
body:
10 or so frames wouldnt bother me, but when im bouncing around from 150 to 40 then back up and down its kinda horrid.

I haven't noticed an issue on any of my other games ive been playing.
Im uninstalling/reinstalling now. Hope it helps.

replies.body: There's been a few updates with Windows, and you may have outdated drivers.  There could also be other issues like bad game files, but drivers are a common culprit.  To be sure and rule out possibilities, go over our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide for a list of steps to tune up your PC.  Hopefully, this will get you back in at smooth speed!
